Name: The Owl Quest
About the game: Presentation The Owl Quest is an unpretentious little pixel art point'n click adventure game that aims to immerse the player in the atmosphere of the first adventure games of the 80s and 90s. Skilfully mixing offbeat humor, winks to past games and nostalgia for that time, it will awaken many memories for those who experienced the crazy creativity of this period of video games, and will reveal its flavor for those who have not had this chance. Features A good old point & click adventure game Retro pixelart graphics Offbeat humor & dialogs Winks to the games of the 80s and 90s Enigmatic enigmas and mysterious mystery
